questions.questionText: Which of the following class in Bootstrap is used to provide a responsive fixed width container?
questions.explanation: The .container class is used to create boxed content.

questions.questionText: Which of the following class in bootstrap is used to create a big box for calling extra attention?
questions.explanation: The class .jumbotron within the <div> element is used to create a jumbotron.

questions.questionText: The plugin used to create a cycle through elements as a slideshow is ?
questions.explanation: If you want to add plugin functionality individually, then you have to use carousel.js file all at once (using bootstrap.js or bootstrap.min.js).

questions.questionText: Which of the following class in Bootstrap is used to create a dropdown menu?
questions.explanation: We have to wrap dropdown menu within the class .dropdown to create Bootstrap Dropdown.

questions.questionText: Which of the following plugin in Bootstrap is used to create a modal window?
questions.explanation: The bootstrap modal plugin is a dialog box/popup window that is displayed on top of the current page.
TypeScript is a strongly typed, object oriented, compiled language. It was designed by Anders Hejlsberg (designer of C#) at Microsoft.

questions.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in TypeScript?
questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files
TypeScript Definition file (with .d.ts extension) provides definition for external JavaScript libraries.

questions.questionText: Which of the following are features of typeScript?
questions.explanation: All of the above are the Features of TypeScript.

questions.questionText: What are the benefits of TypeScript?

options.text: Use calss based object oriented Programming

questions.explanation: All of the above are the Benefits of TypeScript.
